channel.title: [PI] Command Help
channel.description:
Hello Everyone,
I need to make a command, that does the following.
1.) Give them full Dharoks 2.) Takes away 600 Pk Points 3.) If they don't have enough, it tells them 4.) Command is ::dharoks
Thanks, Rep ++ for help as always.

item.title: [PI] Command Help
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

[quote=“runewings317, post:2, topic:397176”]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“dhoraks”) && hasItem(995, 600000)) {
addItem(id, amt);
addItem(id, amt);
PUT_AS_MANY_OF_THOSE_AS_YOU_NEED
deleteItemId(995, 600000);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You do not have enough coins to buy this.”);
}

That should work[/quote]

It looks right,

But it is taking away Pk points, not cash :\

Thanks tho

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Command Help
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“dhoraks”) && hasItem(995, 600000)) {
addItem(id, amt);
addItem(id, amt);
PUT_AS_MANY_OF_THOSE_AS_YOU_NEED
deleteItemId(995, 600000);
} else {
c.sendMessage(“You do not have enough coins to buy this.”);
}
